archimate:WorkPackage.name: Security Baseline Release 3
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation: Project for modifying the Security Baseline to be more simple and easy to implement - goals is to align it with biggest risks and threats to Connect services, and categorize and select relevant controls per service type. Owned by Connect CISO Mikael Lingskog. For more details, please see "Security Baseline Release 3 work package definition".
